Hear me out, right: Joel McHale, but he's on Always Sunny In Philadelphia as a protagonist of Paddy's Pub.

You can tell a lot about a person by these categories:

Eggs: Poached or sunny side up

Steak: Medium

Milk: Hi lo

Alcohol: Apple cider at a pub or whisky with coke at a club.

Warm Drink: Nothing but if everyone is having one then a hot chocolate.
